Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: So much VOLUME
Review: I DONT like this product but it’s just because of my hair type. I avoid the word volume like the plague because my hair already has a lot of volume. I ordered this because I didn’t see anything about volume on the package or in the product description and it SMELLS AMAZING!! But it makes my hair have an insane amount of volume so I can’t use it. Tried it on my 3 year olds hair and got the same result even tho I’ve never had an issue with too much volume in her hair before. Wanted to leave a review so you can order according to your hair type

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: I like this leave in conditioner
Review: I like this leave in conditioner, but it runs out quite fast for me - I have a hard time gauging quanitity with a spray leave-in conditioner.But it smells fantastic. And it is very light, maybe a little too light, because it's hard to know when you've used too much. It doesn't build up at all, doesn't harden, it just kind of makes your hair a little curlier (as a 2C/3A curly girl). And on a bad curly hair day, it's hard to know if it's doing anything at all, I hate to admit. It's nice, but I prefer to use it in conjunction with other leave in conditioners, or to use it as a refresher spray on damp 2nd day hair. I think it's a little too expensive for me to buy again, especially since it's a product that left me feeling only lukewarm, but it is a good price to buy as a refresher spray.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: The smell is Heavenly; leaves my biracial daughter’s curls detangled moisturized soft & never crispy
Review: I love that I can get Carol’s Daughter on Amazon. I knew the maker of these products when she was making them in her kitchen in Brooklyn. The scent is Heavenly! Ingredients are all natural. I have used Carol’s Daughter products since my own daughter was a newborn, and she is now a Freshman in college! She is mixed race, and this product leaves her curls moisturized and detangled, but not weighed down or greasy. Her curls dry soft and never crispy after her hair air dries. This smell will always remind me of my baby!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: I like to use my leave in conditioner as a refresher
Review: I like to use my leave in conditioner as a refresher, but this makes my hair feel dry and crunchy. My hair felt wirey and rough. It smells nice though.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not for me, hair like hay after use
Review: Unfortunately this did not work for me.  I’m African American with relaxed hair.  I was looking for something to use while all the beauty shops were closed due to the corona virus. I had picked up the shampoo version of this product at Target.The combination dried out my hair to the point it felt like straw or hay.  I try using more of this product.  I tried using less and nothing worked.  I still had the same outcome.  I had nothing else in the house to use but this & the matching shampoo so u used it.Please note my hair is typically soft and bouncy.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Adds Shine and Manageability
Review: I recently cut my hair and my texture changed and I had issues with finding products that would keep my hair moisturized. It promotes the definition of my curls, and shine and allows for great manageability. It also has a great smell. I use this in collaboration with the black vanilla shampoo, conditioner and Comb through creme. Right after I wash and apply the creme I spray this over my hair and do a last comb through and it adds that extra shine. I use this daily to refresh my hair as well. It has given me amazing results.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Dries hair more
Review: I love the smell of it which is why I'll give it 2 stars, but it didn't help my hair. My curls got stiff and dry. The texture turned straw-like. I don't use any heat tools including blow drying. i let my hair air dry because I'm trying to grow it out. I tried using it in both damp and dry hair, but it always looked like I soaked my hair in sugar water. I wouldn't buy this again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Liquid gold - CG APPROVED
Review: I am not into complicated routines. I subscribe to the Curly Girl Method but I keep it simple and cheap. I use sauve essentials or tresemme botanique as a co wash but eventually I found that my hair was dull and dry, (but still better than it was with any other routine). I finally gave in and found this CGM approved leave-in conditioner for a boost of moisture. I now have the perfect routine for my hair! I honestly did not expect it to be this good. I've tried so many leave-in conditioners and they usually make my hair look really greasy or they weigh it down, ruining my curls. This is like pure lightweight silk on my hair. I found that the overall poofiness/volume of my hair did decrease somewhat after I applied it but that is only because I had so much frizz and this took care of all the frizz. I added a few sprays on each side of my head while I was still in the shower with shopping wet hair and squeezed it in ("squish to condish") after co washing with my usual conditioner (the cheap one) and this product provided all the moisture that my hair could ever want. It was instantly super silky and slippery in the shower. If you have tangly hair this would probably help you a lot.Tl;dr -This stuff is liquid gold. Super silky. Tamed my frizz and tangles. CGM APPROVED! With how good this product is, they could honestly charge more (pls don't)Thank you Carol's Daughter for making this awesome product!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: The best
Review: Beard stays nice and moisturized throughout the day. Great Buy

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not satisfied with product
Review: Hi I have very thick hair and it tends to be a little dry at times. I ordered this product because I'm always open to trying new things on my hair. It did absolutely nothing for my hair. As a matter of fact it made my hair feel crispy.  Maybe others have had positive results after using this product but not me. Also the scent is very over powering. It is like strong vanilla overload.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Made my scalp burn and itch terribly!!
Review: I've purchased this product many times in the store and loved it. But I'm not sure if I recieved a bad product or what but as soon as I sprayed this in my hair....my hair started itching non stop and burning!!! I was shocked bc I've purchased this same item from target and etc before! I immediately washed my hair and just thought the burning and itching was caused by something else bc I use black castor oil and others on my hair daily to moisturize it.I used this spray again and my hair started burning and itching horribly! I'm not sure if amazon is selling the same product as you would get from a store but this can not be the same formula Carol's daughter uses in their normal leave in spray!Threw it away and will never purchase this from Amazon again!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Defrizzes, super lightweight
Review: I have wavy hair that with the right product gets curly. I've used this for a while now and have to say it's the best stuff I've ever used hands down. If I put a little in it softens my hair to style with but more gives me the curls I can let hang down. I spritz it after a shower and go to bed and wake up with all kinds of curls and angles. It keeps my frizz down without having to put in my creams. If my hair is longer I use the mix just to keep it controlled. If you need light weight softening and defrizzing definitely try it!(I will note that I've used it for morning showers and my hair tends to poof as it dries and it only helps if I'm not moving around or pin it a bit. Still makes it super soft frizz at least :P)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells great, but doesn’t work
Review: Let’s start with the good: like everyone else said, it smells great! I also liked that it didn’t have all the bad stuff in it. Turns out, it may need some of those things to work well.Overall, I’m not impressed with this as a leave in conditioner. I have long, highlighted, fine blond hair. I typically use a leave in conditioner as a detangler and to provide extra moisture to the ends of my hair. This doesn’t do either well.  It takes me so long to brush out my hair I might as well not be using any products at all.  Seriously, Suave kids works better than this. The ends of my hair feel dry, snagly, and crunchy after I use this. I would return it if I could, but I’ve been using it for a week trying to give it a fair shot. The only good news is I need to use soooo much of this to brush out my hair that it won’t take me long to use it up so I can go back to Argan Magic 10 in 1 which really is truly magic compared to this.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Great for Fine, Straight Hair
Review: I have extremely fine, straight hair, and I was looking for a conditioner to use before blow drying. This works great! It is not too heavy and the scent is light (it actually disappears after drying). I suffer from periodic hair loss, and this doesn't weigh down my fine hair at all. Now I actually skip my conditioner--I just shampoo and spray this on. Even air-drying my hair, this doesn't weigh it down. My hair is also graying, and the gray hair is silky soft. I recommend this for those with fine, straight hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells great!
Review: I had been using a cheaper, coconut oil based leave in conditioner spray. I mostly just use it for detangling but my hair is a weird mix of wavy and straight and I’ve noticed with some products, it has a more even wavy texture. I didn’t notice this product helping much in terms of my hair texture but I didn’t really expect much there so it’s fine! It smells amazing, my hair is super soft, and it’s shiny. It also has better ingredients than my cheaper spray so that’s a plus. I also use it on my daughter’s very fine straight hair and it definitively helps us brush it and keep it detangled.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Is this the real product? It made my hair worse than before.
Review: I'm not sure if I received the real product, as the brand itself has great reviews, however the leave-in spray I received is anything but. I ordered the Black Vanilla spray, as someone in the comments recommended it for dry, damaged hair. I put it in after brushing my hair out the night prior, and woke up to extremely dry, knotted and tangled hair. I even had tangles near my scalp where it is normally greasy. I was trying to find some type of product comparable to the It's A 10, but more light weight. This is not it. I'm pulling the knots out of my hair and my strands along with it. Despite my hair being somewhat damaged, I have relatively healthy, strong hair. It was on track to getting its moisture back, but I feel like this product put me right back to where I had just bleached it moisture-wise.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells great, but works terribly!
Review: As a stylist, I am always on the hunt for budget friendly products that work well. I was really excited to try this after several recommendations. The smell is amazing, the product is terrible though. My hair is long and curly, and this product dried my hair out horribly. It has taken me 3 weeks worth of treatments to rescue it from the swimming pool texture it was after using this "leave in". I would not recommend this to anyone.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not an effective leave in conditioner.
Review: I use Carol's Daughters black vanilla conditioner and love it, so I thought the leave in conditioner would be great as well. Not the case. I wasn't expecting a spray, liquid leave in conditioner, but that's my fault for not paying attention. Fiiiine product itself does not reduce frizz or make your hair shiny, it acts more like a hair conditioner, which is not what I need or want. Smells nice though.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: LOVE!
Review: we’ve tried 10+ products in past year and this one by far is the BEST. Not over priced and works amazingly! Her curls are so soft, shiny and moisturized! Will definitely be putting on auto ship!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells SO good
Review: I absolutely love all the carols daughter products. Especially this leave in conditioner. It smells so amazing but it’s not overpowering. My only complaint is that it sometimes leaves a purple residue on my pillowcase. But it is well worth the conditioning effect and the smell. But just so others are aware you might find that. I noticed it most when I’m using it on my braids so it might have something to do with that.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Best product ever for curly, frizzy, fine, hair!
Review: Stop searching. This is the product. I have all of her products. I searched for decades for a wonderful line of hair miracles and HERE IT IS! You are welcome! :) Moisturizes, softens, and makes my massive yet fine, curly, frizzy mop manageable & the ability to style it or leave it down. Really. Buy all of it. And the prices are silly low. I love you, Carol’s Daughter!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Drying. not hydrating.
Review: I have been using this since 2010 on braids extensions. It is not hydrating. It is drying. This is more of a hair perfume.Everyone loves the scent.l I recently switched to pure aloe vera juice using the LCO method and cornrows. Im finally approaching mid-back in 2021. You are better off using filtered water and  a creme leave in conditioner. The fact that I switched this product and immediately saw more length retention should tell you something.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Does not condition
Review: I thought this was going to be a conditioning product. Instead it’s more like a hair fragrance. It does smell really good, I have to give it that but because it’s listed as a leave in conditioner onlI thought this was going to be a conditioning product. Instead it’s more like a hair fragrance. It does smell really good, I have to give it that but because it’s listed as a leave in conditioner it only gets 1 star

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Lots of alcohol and cheap smell (STICKY!)
Review: Feels like putting cheap perfume in your hair. Literally feels like perfume and not conditioning at all. It smells like rubbing alcohol which isn’t surprising since glycerin (a type of alcohol) is the fourth ingredient. It also contains citric acid and benzoyl alcohol above the good active ingredients. This is very disappointing. (Update I decided to give it a try and it is literally sticky and my hair became matted and disgusting)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Wonderful product.
Review: I love this product.  It is one of the best I've found.  I am 54 years old and I have let my hair go to its natural color, which is now mixed with gray curls.  This product really brings out the curl and leaves my hair softer than many products. It smells amazing too.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells great and easy to use!
Review: Love this product!! I am not one who uses a lot of hair products but this is so easy to use. You can use it while your hair is damp or dry which is nice. It smells really good not to overwhelming but nice. You are sure to get compliments from anyone who comes close to you. I feel like when my hair is looking dull it adds more life to it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells lovely, but leaves my hair feeling like straw :(
Review: ...Pretty much the title.  I have thick but fine curls (AKA thin hair strands, but a lot of them), maybe type 2b/2c with average porosity.  This stuff made my hair crispy and brittle-feeling.  If I wanted that feeling, I'd buy hair gel.  The search continues...

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Different ingredients
Review: Vertical picture is new bottle with different ingredients than older original horizontal picture. Smell is not the same and neither is how it makes the hair look, it's this now a changed formula or a knock off?

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: AMAZING!
Review: Everything about this is amazing. From the scent to how it moisturizes, softens, and adds shine....it's just so good! I really need to buy another one.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Ingredients on Amazon are listed wrong
Review: I purchased this the other day hoping it would be good for my low porosity hair. I clicked the ingredients section on Amazon and after reviewing them decided this would work well for me. Unfortunately I purchased it without looking at the photos of the bottle. If I would have, I would’ve seen that the second ingredient is castor oil (which tends to be a heavier oil). Now that’s not to say that this isn’t going to be a great product, but I wouldn’t have bought it if I’d noticed that. So basically, I just wanted to warn anyone who is buying this based solely on Amazon’s list of ingredients- that it is incorrect.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Have it a shot and I lost....
Review: I don’t think this product did, it seems like just some off smelling water in a spray bottle.It left my hair feeling dry, brittle, and did nothing to help with tangles. I actually felt like a had close to 2 times the hair in my brush after brushing as I normally did prior to this product. I will not be using this item and it will likely go in the trash.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells good.... and that’s it.
Review: Does not DETANGLE or any of that other stuff it says it does. At least not for my hair, didn’t work when the hair was out, made it dry. However I did end up using it has a mist for my hair when I had braids in, to add in some moisture and make my hair smell good. So it worked that way. If you have in a protective style you can use it to add some moisture or you can save your money and use water and some oil.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not Great!
Review: I have curly hair so I was hoping it would make my hair silky and easy to brush.  It did not.  I used a Wet Brush which usually helps glide through my hair with other spray in/leave in conditioners.  It was not good at all.  It didn't help with knots or tangles.  I even used the same brand shampoo and conditioner.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Didn’t work on my hair. Blonde, long, lots of hair
Review: Made my hair brittle n dry

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This product is awesome on my hair right after I wash it or when it is dry. It has a phenomenal smell and works on curly or straight hairstyles, wet or dry hair. It adds a sheen to my hair when I spray it on my hair right before styling. It gives an extra layer of conditioning right after I wash it, especially when I wear my hair in natural styles. It is a good value.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: What moisture? What scent? What softness?
Review: I am so disappointed in this product.  It is equivalent to colored water. I saw no moisture or shine at all. After spraying it in my hair, it feels just like water sprayed in the hair. I will not waste my money on spray water again. Very disappointed. I cam spray water in my hair to get it wet, so I don't need $10 spray water.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not for my hair
Review: I have 3C hair & this spray not only DIDN’T leave it feeling “conditioned”, it made my hair feel so dry & straw-like, I had to slather hair oils over the top of it to try & soften my curls, which then left it looking greasy/oily. Smells ok, if you like vanilla (but it’s my least favorite). I won’t be purchasing this again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Weighed Hair Down
Review: I was very eager to try this product with my favorite scents. It arrived timely with no issues with the packaging. However, when I applied it to my hair which is fine, it really weighed my hair down. It was just too heavy, and I could not tolerate feeling so much product in my hair. Smells great but didn't work for me based on my hair type.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: I love it!
Review: I seriously love this whole Black Vanilla line.The leave-in doesn’t feel like your typical product at first.  It feels kind of tacky when it’s wet, and that worried me the first time I used it. But after my hair dries, I’m left with the softest springiest curls EVER!  And the scent lasts all day.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Love it, but not from Amazon
Review: I love the product, just not from Amazon. I received two bottles, both of which had some weird mold-like substance at the bottom. I’ve been using the conditioner for years, and have never seen that other than in the bottles I ordered from here. I even bought a replacement at a brick and mortar store in town afterward to make sure; no moldy stuff at the bottom of that bottle!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Go to your local drugstore.
Review: I was really excited to get this product because I heard, but I was disappointed. The product that I received seems to be fake. Although it smells pretty nice, it makes my daughter's hair fell weirdly gross. It almost feels similar to a dry wax texture. I went to my local CVS and bought it and there was a dramatic difference.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Love/hate relationship with the fragrance
Review: I am torned regarding the fragrance.  I have a love /hate relationship with the smell.  The product seems to help the frizzles which was my goal.  It is surprising light in feel of product.  I was expecting something a little heavier, but this is a very light spray.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells great. Get U Some.
Review: Awesome!! Makes your hair smell so good. Not sure if it’s moisturizing anything fr but it smells so good. I had exactly one compliment on my perfume but it was this spray..NOT my perfume. Nice and fresh vanilla. Love it. I’ll get more. I’ve been spraying the crap out of it yet the bottle is still miraculously full. I respect that.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Great for curls
Review: Finding this has literally changed my life. I don't know or really care if it has any actual conditioning properties but spraying this on after washing leaves my curls defined and bouncy. It has a small amount hold and keeps frizz at bay. It does not make my hair at all soft but boy do I look good. I completely recommend giving it a try.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Makes my hair feel more damaged.
Review: I used this a few times and every time it was more difficult to brush my hair.  My hair felt as if I had been at a beach all day.  It was as if this made my hair more likely to tangle.  I used it on my child to style his hair and he broke out in a rash saying his head burned.  I don't know what is in this, but it doesn't work for my family.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells pretty but a nightmare for hair.
Review: I bought this item because I have some flyaways and sometimes frizzy hair. When I sprayed this on with damp hair and on dry hair. My hair becomes very frizzy right after. I was embarrassed, because people kept staring at my hair. It smells nice, but my fine straight hair was everywhere.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Then and Now
Review: When I first started using this product, I didn't see any strands in my comb or hair pick. After continued use, I noticed breakage. Sadly disappointing. The creator is African American. It may work on her and her family's hair, but mine? I don't know. Maybe I should use it in conjunction with the straightening spray from Fantasia. We'll see.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Amazing scent & great results!
Review: I LOVE the smell of this detangling spray, and it works incredibly well along with the shampoo and conditioner!  I have long, thick, & somewhat curly hair, and let’s just say I’m not as young as I used to be.  My hair has gotten dryer and more difficult to manage as I age.  I was skeptical when I found these products, but boy was that wrong!  I highly recommend!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: No moisture but smells great
Review: Smells soooo good!!! But lacks for me in any moisture. My hair felt no different no softer nothing.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Review: Like this product! Not a big coconut person anymore but once i got used to the smell it wasn’t so bad! Got lots of compliments that i smelled good when i used this product! Product doesn’t work instantly but definitely feel the change as time goes on and doesn’t leave my hair feeling thick or greasy!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Just left my hair with a greasy weight and sheen
Review: I have long, naturally wavy hair that I like to put a little product in and air dry. I live in Alaska though, so I'm on a perpetual search for a product that will work for a second day, too, so I'm not cold and wet every single morning. This product did nothing I was hoping for, (besides smelling good) even on the first day of use. It goes from doing nothing, to greasy in one pump of spray. I would be willing to try the jar of creme (initially they were both in the cart to purchase) but Amazon won't ship it to Alaska.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Useless stuff
Review: Its nothing but water. It feels like u just spritzing water on your hair , doesn't help detangling or leave hair soft. Seriously just wanna use it up . Will never purchase again

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Expensive product does not work.
Review: My frizzy hair has me trying all and any hair care products.I got this by itself. It didn't work, so I bought the shampoo and conditioner that goes with it.Still left my hair dry and frizzy.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Leaves hair dry and stiff, but smells good I guess
Review: So I’ve tried this product a handful of times now and it made my hair feel more stiff, knotted, and dry. I have thicker/wavy hair, and literally can’t even run my fingers through my hair after use. Almost worked as like a pomade for me which would’ve been nice if I had short hair, but as a guy with longer hair it really isn’t working at all. I threw a almost full bottle away just due to the fact I don’t even want to try and refund it. If you have long, wavy, naturally dry hair I recommend using Tea Tree leave in conditioner, works a lot better for me. Hope this helps.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not for children
Review: I do not recommend this product for children. My daughter is half black and mexican almost 5 years old and I used this product for two weeks and it dried her hair out. Dried out the ends. I had to purchase another product to restore her hair.  Maybe it should only be for adults.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Scent change
Review: The scent has changed from vanilla to a synthetic scent (smells like sweet plastic.) This same thing happened back in the early 90s at Bath and Bodyworks when they expanded their product line and were looking to save money on ingredients.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Natural Curly Hair Miracle
Review: The first picture, Carol's Daughter products only. Used & washed on 11/27/19. 11.28.18 not washed. I had it up, as I was cooking all day. Took it down to take this picture. Still curly n cute, pic 2. Not naming product line. Carol's Daughter has me 4 life. 💯❤

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Doesn't detangle for my mixed race curly hair kid
Review: I am wondering if I received a scam product. This smells like coconut, as mentioned by other reviews. It does not detangle at all nor moisturize. My toddler, who is mixed, has medium length curly hair with a fine texture. It is painful to try to comb his hair with this product. Maybe he doesn't have the right hair texture. I'll be returning to the ion series leave in conditioner. The scent is pleasing but too strong.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Left my hair coarse
Review: I love the lush vanilla scent of this product and really wanted to like it but it just didn't do anything to benefit my hair. My hair usually feels nice and smooth even after just using sulfate free shampoo but after using this leave in conditioner it feels kind of hay like, stiff, and frizzy. Such a disappointment.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Possibly expired when received. Smells amazing.
Review: Scent is amazing! However, I think the product was expired when I received it. There is a gel like substance that gathers around the edges of the bottle and won’t shake loose. It is also very drying to both my extensions and natural hair. However, I’ve bought this product in store previously and it was great!!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Game changer
Review: I love how moisturizing this left my hair! And, it felt light and not weighed down. For reference, I have oily scalp but dry, frizzy, textured hair. Love this product! I’m on my 4th bottle.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Keep hair smelling good and soft
Review: This product is very good, moisturizing smell good and keep hair soft

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Light weight and smells good
Review: This product has done wonders for my hair. I have thin, fine, curly hair and I have a hard time finding leave-in conditioners that don't weigh my hair down. This is a light conditioner and it smells really good.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Terrible
Review: It dried my hair out.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Great Second Day Hair Refresher!
Review: This is a great product full of wonderful ingredients!  I find this to be a great second day hair refresher.  There was a learning curve with this for me...but loved it after I figured out how it works best for my hair!  The smell is strong, but not too strong for me, beware if you have headaches though!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Thumbs down.
Review: I thought the fragrance sounded nice but the smell isn’t great. Didn’t really help with tangles either. They gave me a refund so I can’t complain there.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Shiny and, soft hair!
Review: I have these baby hairs that just go everywhere, I think they are grey but I'm don't wanna admit it yet lol but they are a bit rough compared to the rest of my hair. It works well and, softens them right up. Makes me hair really shiny and, soft! Smells great! I spray it into my damp hair and, brush it. I don't use a lot either.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: More like scented water
Review: It really just feels like scented water, it does really nothing in my hair and my sister said it is the same for her, for me it is a total waste of money because even if the scent is very good i didn't need scented water. I tried putted a small amount or a lot and it is the same result.As much as I dont like to leave bad reviews i really can't recommend this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Look for a different product!
Review: I don’t understand the rave reviews with this product but it was one of the worst I ever used. It made my sons hair sticky and did not define the curls at all. The smell was ok but definitely more coconut than vanilla.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Great conditioner!!!
Review: I was introduced to Carol's  Daughters when I was in rehab! My hair is long, thick and curly! Before I could get up very much my hair was a mess! This helped get tangled out right away and the moisture helped so I didn't get "rats nests" in my hair!!! I have used it since I got out a year ago!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not a great stand alone hair product.
Review: I purchased this product as a morning refresher for my hair before I added any creams. My natural coiled hair is thin and dry. This product doesn't work for me as a standalone. I didn't get the softness or the shine that I expected. It is moisturizing in the sense that it's wet. The scent is great and is one of the reasons I keep using it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Not a fan of the smell
Review: Was excited to buy this leave in conditioner but was disappointed with it due to the smell. I found the smell pretty unpleasant and overpowering so I didn't use it more than twice. Even during the two times I used it, I don't think it made my hair feel much different.I recommend searching for a different leave in.Hair type/description: dark brown, (really) wavy, a little poofy/frizzy, on the drier side

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Stiff Hair
Review: The smell is really lovely but this spray makes my hair feel stiff and brittle almost. It doesn't add softness or moisture which is what you would expect from a leave in. Very disappointed

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Perfume
Review: Read the ingredients.... you can use this stuff for a men’s cologne so why would you apply to your hair???? This stuff gave me a complete headache and arrived leaking!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Doesn't condition hair at all.left it dry and frizzy w little scent as well
Review: Hair was not easy to comb out as no conditioner in product at all. Scent is null to none. Hair dry and frizzy..super disappointed

Title: Smells great

Title: Great for the curls
Review: I notice instantly the change in my hair. My hair is 3C curl type and it moisturized greatly onto my curls, give it a try you will not regret it!!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Very Good
Review: First time user of this product. It's very good , makes your hair very soft, scent is very mild and moisturizing is excellent.

Title: Not what I remembered

Title: My go-to hair product
Review: I have thick, long, naturally wavy hair. This product is great to leave in while wet and blow-dry, as well as for finishing the ends when dry. Many people have commented on the pleasant fragrance.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: I used this on my 2 yr old grandson’s Afro.Wasn’t as moisturizing as I thought it would be. Seemed to be more water based and I didn’t notice any benefits of the many natural essential herbs listed on the label.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Soft & Shiny
Review: A lifesaver for my step daughter's mix hair. 1/2 white, 1/2 black. Her texture is thin & her hair wants to afro all day. This keeps it smooth, soft, shiny and helps bring out her curls. I wet her hair before spraying. Lasts awhile. Smells beautifully. Not sticky or oily at all. Doesn't need any added products for styling with this.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: I love the smell, bottle, and effect!
Review: This is the best leave in conditioner. it works especially well in coarse or curly hair, but also all hair types!I love how it's applied and the bottle and the smell.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Great product

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Nice

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: A Favorite Hair Product
Review: I Love this spray on leave in conditioner.  The Vanilla fragrance is wonderful. I recommend it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: My Favorite leave in

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Dries out your hair badly.

Title: Dry hair

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Smells sooooo good

Title: Feels like it makes hair dryer

Title: Leaves hair dry and hard

Immediately when I sprayed it in my damp hair, it started getting dry and hard. I thought it was supposed to do the opposite. My hair is usually soft and silky, even after blow drying. Not this time :(

Product: Carol’s Daughter Black Vanilla Moisture & Shine Leave In Conditioner for Dry Hair and Dull Hair, with Aloe, Vitamin B5 and Wheat Protein, 8 fl oz
Title: Quite disappointed
Review: Because it's a leave-in conditioner, I really thought this product would give a nice soft/conditioned feel to my hair, but it was the total opposite! Excited to use it on my clean head of sisterlocks, by mid-morning, my hair felt dry, stiff and might I add, sticky. I know that sounds weird, but I'm not sure if anyone remembers what the Jeri Curl Activator felt like back in the 80's & 90's, well it's like that!! I keep thinking, was I supposed to use it with something else? Well I have. I used it with Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter. It still turned the same...ugh!!OMGoodness was I upset and kinda still am. I'm not sure if it's too late to return it, but I'll definately be looking into doing just that.Very disappointed with this product!!
