Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Improvement in 10 days. No, seriously.
Review: I bought this a little over a week ago and I swear to you my 2C/3A hair looks longer and healthier already. It's not just stretching my curls out, either, because they look as defined as before if not better. My boyfriend even noticed a difference.I'm seeing a lot of comments about the smell. I like it, but it has a ginger-y component that I can see being a little much for delicate noses. It pairs really well with coconut.So yeah, 5 stars, will sing its praises even to bald people and if it's ever discontinued I will go into full mourning.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Disgusting smell. Works okay.
Review: The leave in conditioner smells horrible as if someone mixed some mint and other chemicals in there. I also don’t like the way my hands feel after putting a small amount of the cream in my hair. greasy. the pump also doesn’t work which I was disappointed for so I have to pat the bottle on my hands several times including to squeeze it afterwards for some of the product to come out. It’s not a big deal I know but just a heads up to anyone who is considering to buy the leave in conditioner cream. I think it worked okay on my hair , I’ll still use it until it’s empty but I wouldn’t buy again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: The smell is just so DISGUSTING
Review: I really want to like this product. It detangles and softens my very long straight hair. I’ll give credit where due, it does help get the brush through my hair. But dear god, I simply cannot get over the horrific smell. It has started to make me gag and tear up now when I use it. It is definitely not worth that. It smells very much like very peppery food. It is so gross and even my dog can’t stand the smell. Maybe I got a bad batch but I’ve never bought a hair product that smelled like fermented food before. Seriously, it’s the worst smelling hair product I’ve ever used.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Works Great if you can get over the smell
Review: I have very, thick 4C hair in sisterlocs. Am in the process of lightening my locs so that I can dye them a lighter color, which is a long process and can damage your hair, so my hair has to be keep moisturized. This product works great on my hair. I have been using it about every other night and it has kept my locs moisturized. The smell is bad but since I am using it overnight, I am not that bothered by it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Most horrible odor
Review: This does a descent job of moisturizing if you can get past the most horrendous smell. Seriously it smells like a sewage leak so how well it moisturizes is pointless.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: the best!
Review: i have had really long hair (thin and straight) for years and was looking for something to make my hair less dull and tangled. i struggled with my hair getting knotted since it’s so long and tried coconut oil but it left my hair oily. this product made my hair shiny and soft! makes my hair a lot less tangly and it has helped it become stronger. a lot less split ends and noticeable  breakage since i started using this.  altogether amazing product. i apply two full pumps to my hair from scalp to tips when it is damp and apply an oil when my hair is dry. i dont mind the smell but my mom doesnt care for it, but i highly recommend for everyone!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: No more breakage
Review: I will make this very short.I have always had issues with hair breakage. After applying this product on my hair, especially at the ends where it was always the driest, I have noticed that less of my  hair comes out when combing and brushing. My hair is the equivalent of THAT CHILD who won’t eat anything. I have finally found something that THAT CHILD likes👍🏾

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Highness disappointed
Review: This product feels like any other cheap conditioner, only I paid $20 for it. Very disappointing. I may return for a return.  Not impressed at all.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: The smell is possible WORSE that I can describe
Review: This smells like rancid meat and 20 years of stale cigarettes. I opened the bottle and knew I made a mistake not listening to the reviews warning it was bad. I put the smallest dab on my fingers (no bigger than a pencil eraser) and tested it on my ends….I even wash my hands and the smell is STILL THERE. Lord.I do want to say the return was really easy, in case anyone ends up throwing this out ASAP

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Would buy again !
Review: Love this! Thick consistency but does not weigh down hair. Used on scalp and length,no build up. My hair is about 26 inches long and this nicely coats without weighing down. The smell is just like the notes described. May not be for everyone but a nice product. When applying the smell may be intimidating at first but after application I don’t smell overpowered at all by it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Does What it Promises
Review: I find this scent alluring. It is a most magnificent  moisturizer that tames and softens hair by restoring moisture back into the hair shafts thereby hydrating dry strands and scalps

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Full of Alcohol and perfume.
Review: Alcohol Alcohol Alcohol. And the strongest perfume I've ever put on my head.  I am very sensitive to perfumes so I almost choked from the scent. And then, my hair became dry and brittle as if I put gel in it. By far the worst leave in conditioner I've ever used. What a waste of money.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Moisturized, soft, shiny hair!
Review: My natural kinky curly hair tended to look and feel dry before using this product!  I love it! My go-to gel is Ecostyler, and it is finicky about what products can be mixed with it, but this one is great!  My hair is shiny, soft, and moisturized days after wash day (with minimal daily upkeep).  I love the fresh scent, but it is very light and almost non-existent after application.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: love this product
Review: i love love love this leave in conditioner. it makes my hair so soft and shiny. i dye my hair blonde and i saw it helped with my little damage right away ! a little bit goes a long way and it’s super cheap too! i didn’t expect much because of the price but i love this stuff! super moisturizing for your hair

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Perfect for wet hair,  any type of hair, perfect for course , dry and curly hair
Review: I love the fact that I can use it like gel. Summertime I usually have my hair up Nd used gel which dryed up my hair the texture of my hair (Curly dry) needs all the oil it Can keep. My oldest daughter told me about this product Nd all the natraul ingredients that’s in it. Had to try it!  I LOVE IT. Extremely good for course, dry or curly hair. It’s applied after being washed and use as if it was moose or gel. A lot isn’t needed . I definitely recommend it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Bothered by the smell
Review: You dont even want to put alot in your hair because the scent is so loud and strong. I literally had to wash it out the smell bothered me that much. The company definitely needs to change that. Haven't you ever heard less is more

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Awful smell
Review: My Gos this stuff stinks!! I used it today on my child’s hair and there is still a lingering stench in my hands. The smell is like cigarette smoke mixed with coffee. Sorry but I don’t think I can let my child walk around smelling like this!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Great for keeping a professional hair bun!
Review: I love this leave in conditioner.  I have stick straight hair (Asian/Hispanic/White) that’s pretty heavy and slick.  I have to wear my hair in a bun for work and I was becoming concerned with losing hair because of the required hairstyle.With this product, I don’t even need to use mousse or hairspray.  I put it in, comb through and braid my hair to put in a bun.  It keeps the breakage to a minimum and gives it a sleek appearance.I’m just not a fan of the fragrance, but deal with it because it keeps my hair healthier.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: The Jury is still out with me on this one
Review: I tried some of this that my sister had and it was thick and creamy . I loved the way it made my hair feel. I ordered some and mine wasn't as thick and creamy.  A little disappointed because I have to use more of it to get the same effect as the first time I used it. I'm wondering if the formula changed. I might try one more order to be sure before I give up one it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Does not work on 3A hair type.
Review: I sae a product review and she said that is does not work on 3a/3c hair type. I still bought it anyway and she was right. The product goes on very smooth and conditioning but hair SOAKS it up to the point that I have to use the 10-15 pumps a day which is not worth it. Also, I can usually tolerate smells but this was OUT OF CONTROL lol. It LITERALLY smells like strawberry vape smoke. Im almost impressed how accurate it is but not impressed with the smell.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Regrow, rebuild, SNAP BACK CREAM
Review: Let me say, live and work in NYC.Had a bad experience at one of Caroles stores.So I respectfully decline to follow or purchase anything from her..CHILE!!! That was over, well ova 10 years ago BEFORE she sold the bizzz....Well now my hair falling out..used the Mimosa Hair Honey on my scalp & hair. I ordered the Shampoo Conditioning sets and love IT ALLL

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Strong fragrance but nice formula
Review: Shaker bottle than I expected. Really nice formula and very moisturizing. The smell was off putting at first but now I kind of like it. A little too perfumy, kinda smells like roses.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Itchy scalp
Review: Not sure why but I’ve been using this for 3 weeks now and my scalp has been very itchy. I thought this would help repair my hair but seems I was wrong.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Burning sensation
Review: 2 types of alcohol, tons of silicone ingredients. Burning sensation on my scalp.  Maybe I am allergic to the ingredients. Had to return it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: exceeds expectations
Review: I was looking for something to help reduce the tangles in the back of my long (COVID - non- haircut) curly hair. This works great to put and leave in right after I wash my hair a few times a week.  It makes the knots less tangled and, added bonus, made the rest of my hair look really healthy and gave it a nice, polished look.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Great taming of hair, delightful scent
Review: This does a great job of taming my hair, without totally flattening it. I'm Caucasian, so to keep it almost weightless I mix a lima bean sized dollop with a little water in my hands, & run it through my clean wet hair. It keeps fly-aways down all day without looking or feeling greasy. Also has a delightful scent!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Works in Moisturizing Hair
Review: I did notice a difference in the falling hair and dryness of my hair.  I really appreciate this. Only drawback is that when the product dry leaves it leaves a dust-like dandruff on my clothing, especially dark colors.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: New go to leave in
Review: I have 3c/4a low porosity, hair. My hair is thin and very dry throughout my crown area. I’m not usually the type to leave reviews but as soon as I put this leave in on my hair, my hair instantly felt more hydrated and my curls woke up.  My first use was 4 days post wash and i’ve been slacking on my daily moisturizer routine so my hair was pretty dry. I put this on my dry matted hair after wearing a bun for the past 4 days and my hair felt great after wards. Not too thick. Left my hair feeling softer and looking more full than usual. Think i found my go to leave in after trying many that don’t compare. Can’t wait to incorporate it into my weekly routine to see long term results.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Lightweight, Great Scent
Review: I really love this leave in conditioner. I don't think that everyone would be too fond of the scent, but I really like it. It reminds me of rosemary, but a little sweeter than that. It makes my hair smell fresh and clean throughout the day, so I really enjoy that. It's the opposite of a scent that'd seem like a musty perfume on your hair. Other than that, its a pretty good leave in, but I don't notice an incredible difference. It's nice to tame and detangle my fine, wavy, frizzy hair without weighing it down too much. I would say that if you want something more moisturizing and with more substance to find another product. This is a simple, lightweight, easy leave in.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Must Have!
Review: The last conditioner you will need!  My frizzy wild curls are completely controlled and beautiful with this conditioner.  I’m serious—I’ve always bought high end conditioners but this is it!  Combine with a wet brush in the shower—my hair combs out easily.I cannot give it enough glowing reviews!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Three Stars for hope
Review: I really want to love this, especially because I love the leave in conditioner mist. I have tried this twice and if I put too much it leaves my hair sticky but if I dont put enough my hair looks dry. Ill try once more and will update my review.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Softness
Review: This is the first time I had purchased something online without hearing about from someone else. This product is great it leaves my hair soft and manageable. I would definitely buy more of this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: A must buy!!
Review: I am usually skeptical about hair products I buy on Amazon but this leave in conditioner is one that I will continue to buy! My hair smells awesome after using this, it also feels great. I cannot believe how great this leave in conditioner makes my hair feel.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Brittle mess this works
Review: I turned 50 this year and my hair used to be shining and healthy but for the past year my hair became dry brittle and was coming out. I have only been using it for 2 days but woke up this morning and my hair still has moisture not like before so I like so far hoping it works

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: I hate the smell!
Review: It hate the smell! It has a strong pungent odor. I was unpleasantly surprised, all if Carol's Daughter products that I've tried have smelled great!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Perfect for me!
Review: 4A curly hair. I use L.O.C to style my hair, I used this leave-in with Santo black poderoso oil and cream, and it was just perfect!!! Even my boyfriend could see the difference. My curls look great, it looks healthy,  shiny, with volume but also soft. Best part I didn't even have to use much, so it's a good value.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: It's okay
Review: I don't believe in bad products when it comes to hair necessarily, unless my hair falls out which it didn't. I have low porosity hair and this is a no to put on my scalp, makes it beyond itchy, and just okay on my actual hair. I'll use til it gone but I won't be buying again

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Hair is soft
Review: I like how my hair feels but don't care for the smell to much. I can't put it in my hair dry or my hair feels dirty. But it works well right when you get out the shower. My bleached blonde hair feels soft and strong and manageable

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: My favorite overpriced leave in
Review: This is my favorite. I have been using it for awhile now. I think it result did my my hair stronger my hair doesn't break off. Its actually harder to break my hair stands. But idk for sure.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 3B hair with High Porosity loves this
Review: So a friend recommended this product. Anytime i put something in my hair it hardens or it just doesn’t maintain it. But this definitely does the trick. I put it on at night, i put my bonnet in the morning and my curls are soft and bouncy!! Totally worth the money!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Best hair product I’ve found in decades.
Review: Your search is over-Stop looking for the perfect product and buy this. Sheer, moisturizing, light weight. I so Love “Carol’s Daughter” Products. I have all of her products & have not found any other that compares. And I’ve spent a mint! Theses are very affordable.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Love this!
Review: This is great!  I have long thick curly hair, so it’s always tangled.  This makes it so easy to brush my hair after a shower....and it leaves my hair feeling soft and not like an oil slick.  Definitely will repurchase, but not for a long time.  This stuff lasts forever.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Alcohol is not my hairs friend
Review: PRODUCT HAS ALCOHOL IN IT WHICH CANCELS OUT THE GOOD OF CASTROL OIL. THIS SPEEDS UP THE DRY scalp process.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: The best!
Review: This is the best product I’ve ever used on my hair! I would wash and blow dry my hair with this leave in and my hair is moisturized, and so easy to manage. It’s good for when you want to wear natural styles, and it keeps your curls all day!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Morning routine must have
Review: I have super long hair. With a bit of this my hair is tangle free and doesn't leave any icky residue or make my hair feel heavy or greasy! Smells great and good price.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Game changer
Review: I gave this a try on my very fine, dry hair, and have noticed a complete 180° change. No longer staticky, moisturized, soft, and so manageable. Highly recommend

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Not for me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Seems alright

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Does everything it should 💕

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Great leave in conditioner!
Review: Love this product! I bought it because my hair was falling out but this castor oil leave in conditioner helps my hair. It’s feels good, smells good & I’m able to style my hair with just this conditioner. I highly recommend it!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Would've been fine if it didn't smell

Title: LOVEE ALL  THEIR PRODUCTS

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz

Title: Carols Daughter leave in conditioner

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Makes taking care of natural hair easier.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Ew

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: A very good product
Review: The best product for my son thick 4a, 4b hair and mine also. It goes on so smooth, and his hair and mine is growing and more manageable when wet. I love the smell, because I use castor and black seed anyway.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Very moisturizing
Review: I like this leave in a lot, I have added it to my daily routine. It is very moisturizing and thick, it also smells like cologne, which I kinda like.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Horrible
Review: This stuff will just turn your hair white, while drying it out. Also, the smell of the product is weird. I have that really dry hair. 4c type so if you have hair moisture retention issues do not buy this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: I like It
Review: I use this as a leave-in conditioner which softens and it smells so good too.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Best Hair  leave in conditioner
Review: Loved the leave in conditioner  help my hair not to be frizzy or dry highly recommend

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: It really helped my sons dry hair
Review: I really enjoy the feel of the conditioner the smell was surprisingly strong but it's pleasant and doesn't irritate a sensitive nose after a little while. My son's hair is curly and dry (3c) and the conditioner really helps keep it soft and helps keep his tangles to a minimum for a 3 year old. It's going to last us a long while and I will probably buy it again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I've never really been brand loyal, but I just might become brand loyal to this conditioner.  It's great.One thing about it that is weird though is the smell.  It smells strongly of ginger and not really that good right out of the bottle, but after my hair dries, I smell my shampoo as much as this conditioner, and the ginger only enhances the smell, so it smells great.  I find that a bit odd, but it works well for me.It is strongly scented, so if you are adverse to strong fragrances, you might want to skip it.  If you get it, and you aren't thrilled with the scent, wait until your hair is dry to really judge it.I have extra fine, aging hair and it really does my hair wonders.  I ONLY use it.  I have just been shampooing my hair and then using about 2 full squirts of this.  My hair is extremely long so most people won't use that much.  Still, I use much, much less of this product than I do of regular conditioner, so the bottle is lasting well and I expect it to last a long time, which makes it a good value.I use it root to tip with the first squirt and work it through, then I put the second squirt only on the lower 2/3 of my hair.  That seems to work well for me.It leaves my hair hydrated, smooth, shiny, and with plenty of body.  My hair takes a curl very easily when I use this.  IF I braid my hair wet after using it, normally my hair looks crimped, but man it looks crazy zig zaggy z-waved. yet smooth after using this!I am noticing less breakage and a ton of shine, yet my hair does not look oily at all and I can go 2-3 days before I feel I need to wash it again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: Very subtle warm scent. I was pleased with how much I loved this scent as it’s hard to imagine based on the spices. It’s not too spicy of a scent though. It’s soft and pleasing and not too strong. You would smell it if sniffing hair but it wouldn’t smell when you walked into a room or anything and you don’t notice anything beyond when you put it on and first style your hair.Love that it’s a leave in.The consistency is super super thick and creamy.Works great on slightly frizzy hair. Helping over time to smooth out my hair too. I mostly like the added subtle scent though. Makes me feel good that my hair feels nice.Like the easy to use pump dispenser- makes it easier to use when rushing around in the am.Full sized product.Nice looking label.I had previously heard of this brand but never actually tried any of the products. I really love this and would now totally consider buying more from this brand.Overall I’d recommend it.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength leave-in hair conditioner is awesome! First, it smells wonderful! Second, it contains some great ingredients that are sure to strengthen my very long hair. Castor Oil and Black Seed Oil are known to strengthen hair. The ginger in this product stimulates the blood flow to the hair, encouraging more growth. Also, this wonderful formula contains no paraben, petrolatum, mineral oil, or artificial colors, all of which may harm the health of your hair.It really detangled my hair after using, making it a cinch to comb. It is easy to use too. All I did was pump some into my hands, then spread it evenly throughout my hair after shampooing. It really tamed my frizzies without flattening my hair or making it greasy. All of this for a low price! This is an awesome product!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger
Review: It took me a few uses, but I'm really enjoying this Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger now! Most of the Leave In Conditioners I've  tried have been sprays. This one is more like a lotion. It worried me a bit, because my hair is very fine and gets weighed down by really heavy conditioners. At first, I think I used too much and I did feel like my stick straight hair was pretty limp. However, I've used less since then and have found that my hair still has the body I like.If you're not a fan of scents, here's a quick word of warning. This  Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger has a strong scent. I can't place if it's the Black Seed Oil or Ginger or the mixture of both, but it smells kind of musky, in a way. It's not a bad smell, though and I've come to really like it. Overall, I'm enjoying this Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger and would buy it again!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Before I had to use an oil mixed with a leave in conditioner to feel like my hair wasn't dry. With this product, I no longer reach for the oil. It took a step out of my routine that I had been doing for years! It hydrates my hair and makes it feel healthy. I really feel like it restores my hair as claimed.  My hair is very dry and fine and always tangles especially at the ends. I've tried a ton of deep conditioners and not one has ever allowed me to run my fingers through my hair. Until now! My hair stayed soft, frizz-free and detangled for the full 2 days until I had to wash it again after a workout. Even without brushing the following day, I could still run my fingers through my hair.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Love Love Love this for my 4b/4c hair !
Review: I’ve never done a hair product review before , but had to let my melanated sista’s know that these two products right here works so well for our textured hair. It makes my hair so soft and manageable and I’m obsessed with the smell. I am now ordering for the second time .

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Awesome Leave-In. Awful Dermatitis.
Review: This did an Amazing job on my hair. One of the few Leave-In conditioners that left me with both moisture AND shine without the greasy or crunchy, stiff curls.HOWEVER, my forehead and cheek dermatitis has flared significantly since use. I'm so glad my dermatologist was able to pinpoint the issue, though it took a few months to resolve. I can't recommend this to anyone with swnsitive, eczema-prone skin.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This leave in conditioner is amazing. First of it has a lot of incredible ingredients that are very good for your hair, such as castor oil, black seed oil and ginger. I personally prefer using leave-in conditioners because quite honestly I am too lazy to wash conditioners out after letting them do their work and a lot of times they leave a residue that feels gross so I prefer to just use on that is meant to be left in, in the first place.This one is just absolutely perfect. For one I really like the scent right out of the bottle, which BTW is a very large bottle at 10oz for $11 a fantastic price. Sadly the scent doesn't last too long, which I would have loved. You don't need a whole lot of the conditioner to apply to your hair, a little bit goes a long way. After you apply it to your wet hair your hair can be brushed easily without any tangles left really. Once your hair is dry it is nice and shiny, feels soft and is just beautiful. You really can't ask for more. If my hair will be stronger after repeat use, well only time will tell but since this is an awesome product I will most definitely find out sooner or later since I have no problem sticking with this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Love it 😍
Review: Im so impressed with this leave in. My go to has been shea moisture castor oil leave in but I usually need a lot or have to add other products to tame the frizz. Just a few pumps of this and my hair in shiny all day. It even works on day two hair for me just to add some moisture if I need it. After applying this I just add some curl cream and kinky curly custard gel to seal then finger coil my whole head and I get the most beautiful curls that look like ya girl curled her hair with heat.  If I’m not styling or going out I just add the leave in and let it dry. Either way its so moisturizing with or without other products. I have high porosity hair and this works perfect. Excited to try other products from this brand.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I have long, thick, curly hair, so moisturizing is a must.  I use conditioner in the shower, but I often need a leave-in conditioner afterward for detangling and less frizz/bushiness.I've used products from this company before that I liked, so I was excited to try this leave-in conditioner.  I'm not disappointed!  The bottle is fairly large, so it should last a while - I only need about 3 pumps for my long hair.  The conditioner has a pleasant scent that isn't too strong.  It definitely helps with detangling.  The conditioner is on the thick side, but it doesn't leave my hair looking greasy or weighed down.  In fact, you can't even tell that there's product in my hair because it looks natural, healthy and clean.  My hair has volume and curls, but is tamed and looks great.  This is one of my favorite leave-in conditioners now!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: wanted to love it
Review: Ever since my dad died, my hair has been falling out like crazy and just not very healthy. I really wanted to love this leave in conditioner to start healing my hair so I'd have one less tangible reminder of my pain. The conditioner didn't quite do it for me though. The scent was not overly strong but lingered for a long time - which wouldn't be a negative except that I did not care for the scent. Additionally, I didn't feel like this left my hair feeling any softer than just using my traditional routine. It did leave my hair feeling crunchy for about 4 to 6 hours after showering though...and my hair looked limp the entire day when I used this leave in conditioner. The one positive is that the pump dispenser made it not too hard to use with wet and/or slippery hands.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Smells great makes my 4c hair manageable after washing.  not to thick and heavy on your hair. With this product you can’t use too much or your hair will  take forever to dry.  It makes my hair curly and pretty.  I have used many products and this by far gives me the best results.  The smell is sometimes overpowering but does not stink.  This is my first time trying this line and I must say it has good results.  I will try the shampoo and other oils they make.  The only issue I have is with pricing, but it makes my hair manageable so I would purchase again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Does moisturize, but I can’t get passed the smell.
Review: Moisturizing but had a strange scent.  I have dry curly hair so a heavy duty conditioner is a must.  This conditioner works ok.  It doesn’t moisturize any better than the normal store brands, but is a decent conditioner.  It is a thick formula.  I like the included pump, but it doesn’t dispense much.  It takes me 3 pumps for my shoulder length hair.  For me the smell is too unpleasant and strong smelling.  I strive to have good smelling clothes and hair, but this doesn’t make the cut.  It is not my favorite and I wouldn’t purchase again.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Effective moisturizer
Review: I used this in my teen's loc'ed hair post washing.  It was used in combination with another moisturizing loc product.  I like the fragrance.  It has a mild ginger, spicy fragrance.  It would be a nice change for those who may not like fruity or floral scents which many products often have.  It moisturized her hair well and she has been able to go longer without needing it to be re-moisturized.  Her hair looks shiny with no residue.  She has very dry, type 4c hair.  I recommend this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: The scent takes a little getting used to- not bad just strong and a bit different compared to other hair products. It is very moisturizing. We mainly use it for my daughter's hair (she's mixed) and in the picture I posted there's only this leave-in conditioner and a little edge control in her hair to get. It looks nice in her curls and so far has been great as a leave-in and also for combing through her hair.My wife (she's Caucasian) uses it, as well. She has very thick, curly hair and her ends often get very dry. She uses this after her hair is dry that way she can start with a little applied to her ends and decide if she wants to add more.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This product has helped my curly, thin hair. It has given it a lot of health and life - instead of the constant breakage, I have notice it is getting stronger with each use.Since it is a leave-in product, it's very easy for me to incorporate into my routines. I shower at night and let my hair air-dry, so I work a pump through my hair, then wake up in the morning to see that it did its job.The smell is fine - not overpowering, but light and pleasant. It's a decent price for the size of the bottle, too, so that is a good value. Overall, it's a good product for repairing weak, broken hair. I would recommend overall.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: The only time I would use this as a leave-in conditioner is when I'm home and not going out. It's a thick serum consistency and is visibly oily on my hair when used, which is why I wouldn't wear it out. I put a couple quarter sized drops on my hand and rub it, then proceed to apply on my hair closer to the scalp. A little goes a long way.So far I'm not really seeing much of a change with the brittleness of my hair even after using it for two weeks. I'll give it another week to see if it actually strengthens my hair then.Scent is mild and tolerable. I'm hoping  to see good results sometime soon.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Disappointed
Review: I promise I'm not one of those people who hate chemicals..I understand everything is made up of chemicals. However....fragrance is awful. It's not only awful but unnecessary. This would smell just fine but no they had to throw fragrance in it. Wish I would have read the ingredients better. I did look over it but guess I missed it. And the amount of fragrance in it is overwhelming and gives me a headache. I was so excited but im seriously upset and will never buy another one of this brands product

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 4.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I haven't really noticed anything different with the feel of my hair having added this leave in conditioner to my hair care repertoire but what is very noticeable is the scent of it. It has a sweet, herbal, floral scent that while I find to be very pleasant,  is also very very strong strong. Fortunately I like the scent and I don't mind the strength of it but it is something to be aware of if you are sensitive to smells.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Saved my hair!
Review: This product literally saved my hair! I have damaged hair from bleaching and have tried several hair masks and products, and this one has worked the best for the money. Olaplex is nice, but the price tag is not worth it. This product, however, does the same quality of repair to the hair for a fraction of the cost. It leaves my hair soft, strong, and full of moisture all day.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Worth the money great for hair
Review: With caster oil in this conditioner, I was sure the smell would not be the best.  I was right about the smell .  However, this product works really well.  It had a great lather, the next time I used it I used less as it is strong and it was plenty so a little goes a long way. I love that it doesn’t have any harsh ingredients and for my combination  hair this conditioner did wonders! It smoothed out my hair, added much needed moisture and shine! I will buy the shampoo next so that I can have the set.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: This was in my mom's bathroom.
Review: I used some of this at my mom's. She said it was heavy with buildup on her hair, but on mine it was looooovely! My mom's hair is thin, and mine is thick 4a/b/c and VERY tangly and frizzy. It detangled sooooo well! And my hair ended up looking full and beautiful after my twist out. It was also left soft and silky. It also seemed to have a bit more stretch than the last twist out with a different product. I will definitely purchase this next time I need more hair product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL INCLUDED
Review: I used this product on my hair as soon as I got it, it was definitely moisturizing as my 3c high porosity hair soaked it right on up. A little also goes a long way. I don’t enjoy the fact that there are silicones in this product and ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL. Had I seen alcohol was an ingredient I would not have purchased.  So unnecessary. Why am I paying 10 dollars for a product with a substance that is meant to dry out and cleanse anything it comes into contact with.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Great concept and execution
Review: Smells okay, I can tell there is honey in it. But as a leave-in conditioner? That is just not for me. So my review is based on washing it out at the end of the shower. I leaves my old, long, hippy hair untangled and smooth. It is fine. I do  not know the price it sells for and that would be a factor in my buying it again. I like that it is made in the USA and has ingredients that are pronounceable (based on memories from my long-ago chem class)!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Great for 3c/4a Hair!!!
Review: i LOVE this product. I used this in the shower to detangle and usually I look at my hand and see a LOT of hair but this time there’s 1-2 hairs on my hand!! Way less breakage and my hair feels so soft and moisturized. LOVE IT! (3c/4a natural hair)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Hair falling out
Review: This is the only product I have changed in my hair routine and I have noticed a ton of my hair falling out. I'm getting hand full of hair falling out my hair  in the shower when I wash my hair and when I detangle. I've never seen soooo much of my hair off my head at one time. Each time I touch my hair whether it's to moisturize or prep for wash day I end up with a handful of hair. This is sooooooo disappointing

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Unimpressed
Review: I gave this several tries, but it does not appear to agree with my hair. I have 90% 4c hair, with a small section of 4a hair above my neck. Using the product resulted in more breakage than usual for the 4c hair.  I was not impressed with its performance on the 4a hair.  Also, I did not like the scent at all.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: VINE VOICE
Review: This leaves my hair oh so soft and less frizz.I found that the ginger is quiet strong at first but once it dries it smells very good, when the wind blows and I get a whiff of it and it smells so good. My kids like to smell my hair now, all the time to see if it smells good!This leaves my hair hydrated but not heavy, smooth and less frizzy and shiny!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This leave in conditioner is nice and rich and hydrates my scalp.  I live in a very dry climate and my head often feels dry especially in the winter months, and this conditioner soothes my scalp as well as keeps my hair smoothly in place.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: Honestly, I really wasn't expecting much from this product, however, I choose it because of the major oils that  are in it. You don't find many hair care products with Black seed oil or castor oil.  I love the scent, but I find that it makes the hair managable and  moisturized.  It's now my go to product, and it's easy to use.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: I love the warm, peppery fragrance of this conditioner. I apply it before I blow dry my hair to help manage frizz and flyaways. My 50+ hair looks shinier, healthier and smoother when I use Carol's Daughter.  If I accidentally apply too much, I have flat hair until I rewash. Be warned that a little goes a long way.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Hit and Miss
Review: It makes your hair really soft and is moisturizing, but it smells like DEATH. I have tried countless hair products, and this smells absolutely horrible. But, it does moisturize your hair and make it really soft - so it's up to you if it's worth the smell or not.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Smells Disgusting
Review: Pump was broken and product smells rancid! This didn't do anything special for my curls. Deeply disappointed!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Perfect for moisturizer waves
Review: Sent is kind of strong but I love this moisturizer.  This moisturizer is thick and heavy so you only need a small amount.  I would recommend for someone with thick, wavy, or curly hair.  This moisturizer helped with my frizz here in Hawaii.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: False advertising bad ingredients
Review: I heard about this product and figured I’d give it a try while I’m on vacation. Usually I’m on top of these things but because it was suggested and claimed to be natural I gave it a try. Unless you want dry hair and more breakage don’t do it. After reading that this product has rubbing alcohol and other bad chemicals I immediately rinsed this stuff out my hair. It has a similar rubbery consistency as Cantu which is another product loaded with crazy chemicals.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: So Nice
Review: I’m really enjoying this.  It makes my, tightly curled, 4C hair soft, moisturized & manageable.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Awesome product for my curls!
Review: Tried it for the first time today and it left my hair super soft and feels moisturized. Will definitely buy again! :)

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Great on mixed race Textured hair!
Review: Great on my mixed race toddler textured hair. It has a strong scent but overall its a nice smell. Conditions well and makes the curls pop and stay!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Works wonders!
Review: This is literally the best product I have purchased for my hair! And I have been bleaching my bangs and small strips of my hair a lot to change the colors and this stuff always repaired and kept my hair soft and feeling healthy!

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Love it

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Buy it

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz

Title: LEAVE IN CONDITOINER

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: I LOVE it!!!!
Review: This was my first time trying Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner and it will not be the last. I love to experiment to see what works and if I love it, I add it to my routine. This product does the work of an amazing strong leave in conditioner yet it's light weight and will not weigh down your hair. I highly recommend this and it will now be a part of my daily hair routine.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: GODDESS QUALITY PRODUCT!
Review: Carol's Daughter products are GREAT!!! This particular product GODDESS STRENGTH is the best moisturizer/leave in cream of all. Fantastic spicy smell!  Current sale deal is buy 2 get $5 off. Great sale! BUT one bottle was not full so I gave it 4 stars overall.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Produced Healthy Hair
Review: Worked well. God purchase. Used to help stop my hair from falling out due to stylist using extremely hot blow dryers and pulling hair with a brush. Started doing my hair myself and used this product as well as the shampoo and scalp cream for at least 6 weeks so far, and my hair is healthier. So, it works for me.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: Scent way too strong.
Review: I couldn’t use it because the scent is so incredibly strong. It’s earthy which is usually fine, but this bordered on pungent. Other Carol’s daughter products are great, not sure why this has *such* a strong smell.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
Title: 5.0 out of 5 stars
Review: My fine hair is fragile and this leave-in conditioner is perfect for my needs. After a thorough washing, I massage in a generous dollop and comb it through. I wrap my hair while it dries. My hair feels much better. I can also brush more in throughout the week as need. It leaves no greasy residue. My split ends are not as unmanageable as they used to be and I seem to have less breakage. I am quite pleased with this product.

Product: Carol’s Daughter Goddess Strength Divine Strength Leave In Conditioner with Castor Oil, Black Seed Oil and Ginger, for Weak, Breakage Prone Hair, Paraben Free, 10 fl oz
